pullRequest.title: Fix server error in script library name

nodes.bodyText: This variable declaration is not needed. Can initialize the value directly in the following step.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            V1_API_PATH_COMPONENT + SCRIPT_LIBRARY_PATH_COMPONENT + "/" + displayName + SCRIPT_LIBRARY_CONTENT_PATH,
          
          
            
                            V1_API_PATH_COMPONENT + SCRIPT_LIBRARY_PATH_COMPONENT + "/%s" + SCRIPT_LIBRARY_CONTENT_PATH,
Added a suggestion because encode(scriptLibrary.getFunctionLibraryName() is a depricated method
also, replace + by %20, because this reference will be returned in the headers
Let's do not modify the access modifiers of the methods. Check other places as well

commit.message: fix server error in scim2 name
